description.ru: Digital Screen. 3 вкуса в одном устройстве. Type-C. Выберите комбинацию вкусов из списка ниже.
description.lv: Digitāls ekrāns. 3 garšas vienā ierīcē. Type-C. Izvēlieties garšu kombināciju no saraksta zemāk.
description.en: Digital screen. 3 flavors in one device. Type-C. Choose a flavor combo from the list below.

flavorList.ru:
Комбинации:
1) RED BULL + BLUEBERRY WATERMELON + MONSTER DRINK
2) BLUEBERRY ICE + BLACK DRAGON ICE + RED BULL
3) CHERRY COLA + WATERMELON ICE + BLUEBERRY ICE
4) STRAWBERRY WATERMELON + COLA ICE + PEACH ICE
5) DOUBLE APPLE ICE + STRAWBERRY DRAGONFRUIT + RED BULL
6) PEACH MANGO PINEAPPLE + STRAWBERRY ICE + RASPBERRY WATERMELON
7) STRAWBERRY RASPBERRY CHERRY + KIWI PASSION FRUIT GUAVA + BLUE RASPBERRY ICE
8) STRAWBERRY WATERMELON + GRAPE ICE + BLUEBERRY RASPBERRY ICE
9) MIXED BERRIES + RED BULL + PEACH ICE
10) PINEAPPLE COCONUT + STRAWBERRY BANANA + BLUE RAZZ ICE
